name: Vanda Engine
short_description:
Vanda Engine is the new FREE and open source development platform for Games and realtime interactive 3D on Windows. Featuring a technology called VScenes, the engine allows anyone to begin building by constructing over many layers or as we call VScenes.

Technically, a VScene is a collection of objects, external scenes in COLLADA format, a PhysX XML scene or built in physics elements, rendering effects, extra textures and other such elements that form the blocks of a real time interative scene.

We have published step by step tutorials about Vanda Engine, 3D tools, and COLLADA format:
http://vandaengine.org/tutorials/

Consider following us on Facebook to be informed about what we’re doing:
http://facebook.com/vandaengine

Check out our gallery to see how Vanda Engine is getting work done:
http://vandaengine.org/gallery/

Please report the bugs to support@vandaengine.org

We accept donations as well. Please visit the following link:
http://vandaengine.org/donate/
summary: A FREE development platform for Games and realtime interactive 3D
